results.title: Enhanced antitumour activity of doxorubicin and simvastatin combination loaded nanoemulsion treatment against a Swiss albino mouse model of Ehrlich ascites carcinoma.
results.text_hl: Enhanced antitumour activity of @CHEMICAL_Doxorubicin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004317 @@@doxorubicin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ combination loaded nanoemulsion treatment against a Swiss albino @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ model of @<m>DISEASE_Carcinoma_Ehrlich_Tumor</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002286 @@@Ehrlich ascites carcinoma@@@.
